metadata.title: CVE-2017-17533 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** default.tcl in Tkabber 1.1 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichmight allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via acrafted URL. NOTE: a third party has indicated that the attack cannot occurbecause of the argument-parsing behavior of the Tcl exec function.

criterions.comment: tkabber package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
